Samsung Pay SDK Flutter Plugin - Release Notes

Version: 1.01.00
Release Date: September 30, 2024

Overview:
This release introduces the Samsung Pay SDK Flutter Plugin to provide a bridge between the Samsung Pay SDK and Flutter, ensuring that developers can utilize all the features of the Samsung Pay SDK within a Flutter-based environment.

Features:
Flutter Integration: Full support for integrating the Samsung Pay SDK with Flutter, allowing developers to use Samsung Wallet in cross-platform applications with minimal effort.


Compatibility:
Samsung Pay SDK Flutter Plugin version 1.01.00 is compatible upto Samsung Pay SDK version 2.19
